email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai, Soybeans 12,000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of soybeans from Santos to Shanghai under FOB terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel candidate and an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai, Soybeans 12,000MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel SEA HARMONY, which has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 190m. The initial freight quote is USD 45 per metric tonne. The laycan dates are from October 15 to October 20.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai, Soybeans 12,000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of USD 45 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rates and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai, Soybeans 12,000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 42 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 8,000 per day, and the loading window in Santos is expected to be 3 days.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai, Soybeans 12,000MT - Acceptance
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 42 per metric tonne. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements for the SEA HARMONY, and confirm the laycan dates and loading window.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai, Soybeans 12,000MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. The laycan dates are confirmed from October 15 to October 20, with a 3-day loading window in Santos. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on any further developments.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
